website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality costume that fits most dogs and also glows in the dark.
pros: Available in sizes to fit dogs X-Small to X-Large
2-piece costume features a fitted outfit and a cap
Quality material, with some stretch to it
Comes with a hanger and a polybag
cons: Some had problems getting this costume to glow very well in the dark
The neck is pretty wide, and can easily slip down over the dog's shoulders

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, wish there was a neck piece!
customer_reviews.text: Great material and well made for the price. I wish there wasn't such a big blank gap between the shoulders and head but im not really sure how you would fix that anyway. Beware if you have a fluffy dog like mine, the hair will stick out around the outfit a bit 😂. Btw my dog is a lean 77lb male GSD with a big chest and I ordered the XL. It fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Awesmechic

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy dog costume that stays on
customer_reviews.text: This costume is technically only on the black dog on the right, but I think its the same as the rest (bought on different years and different websites). The hoods are pointless but I knew that ahead of time. Fits nicely, the back legs really help keep it on them. Black dog is 70lbs and wearing XL. The two pits are 50lbs and wearing larges. The poodle is 10lbs and wearing a small. Girls and boys can pee with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Size large fits our 37 lb pitbull mix nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, our dog didn't mind wearing this! She loved the soft cotton t-shirt material and it looked super cute on Halloween. Unfortunately the hood really didn't fit her big block head well and her ears didn't line up with the holes, so that got shaken off pretty quickly. Luckily the hood really wasn't needed for the effect. Now if she'd just quit barking at all the Trick Or Treat-ers....
customer_reviews.author: Gator Bait

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint: this has a very wide neck and kept slipping further and further down my dog's shoulders, especially when she sat. Otherwise, it was a great dog costume, didn't bother my pup too much, and the gentleman's cut kept everything clean and dry. Like some others have said, the skull/hat thing is a weird shape and doesn't really stay in place. In my opinion, not using it didn't really take anything away from the charm of the costume. I stretched out the holes for the back legs a bit because those seemed a bit tight, but that all depends on the size and build of your dog.
customer_reviews.author: KTB

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11lb maltese/yorkie mix. I didnt think she was going to be a fan of the headpiece but to my surprise it stayed on all night, she didnt try to take it off! After Halloween she continued to wear it every now and then and one time we left it on to sleep and i woke up at 2am to see a glowing skeleton on my bed! So cool
customer_reviews.author: yaritza

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this costume (on sale) for my Boston Terrier, in a size medium. We normally have issues w/outfits not fitting well, since he has such a broad chest. This costume is the perfect fit, except for the hat. The hat does not stay in place, but I don't think he likes it much anyway. Still very cute, and love the fact that it glows in the dark! He has gotten the attention of neighbor's, especially at night. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: I initially chose this based on my last minute costume idea which was a skeleton. I thought this was the perfect match. Indeed, it was! We were a cute duo on Halloween. This costume is also glow in the dark which is a plus for walking at night!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It fit her fine, but there was room to stretch for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I got a medium for my terrier/dachsund mix, ie, short legs, long thick body. It fit her fine, but there was room to stretch for a truly medium dog. She weighs 19 pounds. It really does sort of glow in the dark. We were very pleased. BTW it's not made of thin t-shirt material. It's a fairly thick knit, not sure if it's 100% cotton. Can't remember. I may use it for a winter coat turned inside out. Haha, Florida winter, that is.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Roma

customer_reviews.title: Spooktacular doggo
customer_reviews.text: Bought an XL and it's a little bit bigger than it needs to be so my dog can move around easily in it. The hat doesn't stay on his head very well nor does he really care for it (not a big deal to me). It would've been nice if it had been made into a hoodie instead of the hat being separate. Perfect for Halloween though and then to keep him warm around the house this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates clothes and loved this. It was awkward to put on but once she had it on she loved it. It fit a little awkward in the shoulders but not enough thay it didnt fit. My dog is 90lbs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Costume
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute costume for my puppers! It is a thick-ish t-shirt material, which was unexpected, but welcome as it gives some stretch to put it on. It is very well made, and my fur baby loved it to go trick-or-treating with the family!
customer_reviews.author: Rena H.

customer_reviews.title: Cutee
customer_reviews.text: My dog hated it. I loved it lol! She looked great! She's not a clothes dog so it was not her jam... But it was super cute for the night
customer_reviews.author: Ann Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Nice cotton quality,  glows in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My Yorkie looks very cute on it. My husband and I also have skeleton shirts, so we like to dress up the three of us us alike. Nice cotton quality. Glows in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Clo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Costume - Glows In Dark!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, yes and more yes lol. My black lab pitt tolerated me this year and let me put this thing on him. At first he wasn’t sure, and I was ready to take it off him. But all of a sudden, he was all smiles. I tried to take it off but he wouldn’t let me, so someone slept as a glow in the dark skeleton. This one’s a keeper. Sidenote - my dog weighs about 80lbs and has a muscular but lean build - I got him an XL and it fit him comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Neff

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Glows in dark and they work great as pjs after Halloween!! That's main reason we went with these. Got the xxl and fit my 90lb pit perfect. With plenty of wiggle room!
customer_reviews.author: G. Murray

customer_reviews.title: A million thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these costumes for two of my three guys (one is too big. I can never find anything to fit him), I was expecting the usual, cheap, Halloween costume material that they would rip or ruin by the end of the night. Boy, was I surprised when I got them! Completely exceeded my expectations! These costumes are thick, soft, durable and definitely held up to my crazy huskies' shenanigans! They even washed up well after our Day of the Dead themed Halloween party. They were a HUGE hit!!! Thank you so very much for selling such a great product! Amy Roland (and some crazy huskies)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love love love how cute my pup is in this costume. The hat doesn’t last, but it’s not the important part. My dog is a medium/large mutt with a narrow yet deep chest so he is between medium and large in all things. The costume fits but the skeleton doesn’t line up. Still fine with that. Now my cat and my dog have glow in the dark skeleton costumes and I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara R Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: I love this costume
customer_reviews.text: I love this costume. I got the large for my 70lb mixed breed who is deep chested. The shirt fits wonderfully. The hat, however, is a joke. I'm not sure what dog has a head shaped like that, but it wasn't close to fitting correctly. It stayed on for all of 30 seconds. Otherwise, this costume is great! My mutt was able to run around and do his business with no problem, and he didn't even seem to notice it was on!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Such a great Halloween costume!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and well-made costume. Fit our long-bodied 75-pound lab/shepard mix girl beautifully. The headpiece didn't stay on well at all - we had to keep sticking her ears through it and tell her to stay still for pics - but she has a skinny noggin so I'm sure a bigger-headed dog would be fine. When she wears it next, I'll probably use some safety pins! (We all got nicknamed the "Skeleton Crew" at this charity run we did for California Labs & More Rescue!)
customer_reviews.author: H. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cute costume!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 lb mini schnauzer puppy for Halloween. I was actually impressed at how soft and sturdy the material felt since this was an inexpensive costume. The hat didn't stay on at all but the body of the costume had a great effect. I would definitely by this again in a bigger size for next Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: canonwx

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Labrador puppy who is 42 pounds. Size XL is a tad big but fits well enough and she is still growing. The hat doesn't seem to fit well at all at this point but will stay on her neck like a hanker chief. The quality seems good. Thicker than I expected which is a good thing. Glows in the dark. Just charge it in the sun so it will glow.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute Costume
customer_reviews.text: not only is it adorable but its also good quality! Its like a jumpsuit, that's light and "movable" the dog is able to actually wear it. not just for Halloween.I was very pleased with it,the head piece however is tad too big for my dog (He is a chinese crested and is 9lbs) I simply sewed it to his size but other than that Im very happy with this purchase. The costume I received DOES glows in the dark,and makes it looks pretty cool at night.My dog seems to love it.I definitely recommend this product. The size chart -small IS accurate and true to it's size.
customer_reviews.author: aprlm/ZeusZoo

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, glows fine
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 50# dobie/fox terrier mix great. He is kind of barrel chested so it was a snug fit but looks great. Easy for him to do all his business on walks. Great for walks in our neighborhood where there are few/no streetlights. Glows but not super brightly. I left the hood/headpiece off as he absolutely hated it, and it didn't quite fit his head right. We also used it in our family photo, we were all glow in the dark skeletons :)
customer_reviews.author: Jane Conlin

customer_reviews.title: Paired this with women's skeleton tshirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a women's skeleton tshirt for my dog and I for halloween. I ordered the large (20 in) for my dog who is the size of a cocker spaniel, 28lbs with lots of fluffy hair. It fit perfectly on him and it was super cute. The head piece was too big though, so I had to use a couple safety pins to make it work. Pup says he would wear it again!
customer_reviews.author: Mulan

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. Fits her perfectly I got her a large ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. Our baby looked so cute. This is awesome. Fits her perfectly I got her a large and she is 48 lbs. Prompt delivery. Just so pleased all the way around. She was the cream of the crop on Halloween evening.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: was nice but didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: was a great costume but sadly was too small for my dog
customer_reviews.author: sunnysalvo

customer_reviews.title: Loved the body of the outfit
customer_reviews.text: Loved the body of the outfit! The top hat piece was made very odd and wouldn't fit properly on my dogs head. I got my mini schnauzer a medium, I feel like he could have definitely been ok in a large.
customer_reviews.author: T. DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Dog hated it but I loved it
customer_reviews.text: My Dog hated it so she didn't wear it long but she hates all clothes otherwise it was good and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Manda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume, short lived glow
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume! I didn't torture my dog with the hood, but she made a great grim for Halloween with the shirt. It fit her great, and she is a 42 lb pitbull. Took away one star because while it glowed great at first I set it out in the light to make sure it glowed on Halloween and it wasn't glowing anymore. Still very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Liked the costume. I ordered an extra large for my 65 lb pit bull since she has a broad chest but it was a little big, I would have been better off with a large. It's 100% cotton so hoping it will shrink in the washing machine. Like another reviewer mentioned, it's not exactly anatomically correct but it still looks cute on & my dog didn't mind wearing it all night unlike other Halloween costumes.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Fay

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: The XL fit my 65 lb, stout and very thick haired Golden Retriever like a charm! He was a good sport and wore it for 5 ours. He did not wear the head piece even though it fit fairly well but it is double lined and very thick/not breathable. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for even very-furry dogs
customer_reviews.text: My Australian Shepherd mix has very thick fur, but this soft t-shirt costume fit him comfortably. He refused to wear the headpiece, but even without that he got rave reviews from the Halloween crowd. A bonus is the fact that it is a low-maintenance costume---just slip it on and you're done; much better than other years where we spent half the night adjusting and re-adjusting the outfit we had on him. Excellent glow factor as well, he was visible for some long treks around the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very Scary
customer_reviews.text: We won a prize at the dog park for scariest costume. I threw away the head piece. Will use this for years to come. Comfy on my dog and fits nicely. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: smashbox24cr

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume, poor headpiece
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, so does my 10 mo old 25lb Australian Cattle Dog pup...The costume fits as advertised and is of exellent quality, both fabric and workmanship.The headpiece needs to be redesigned.It did not fit well and I tried putting it on my pup 2 different ways and she hated it and would not wear it.The costume, she wore all day and left it on, like she liked it...We got many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Masterbaker

customer_reviews.title: Purple stained hood ruins outfit
customer_reviews.text: The overall product is cute; a little snug despite following the sizing; however the hood we received is stained a purple color (see photos) which ruins the whole outfit! SO disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Reynas 𖠰

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Costume
customer_reviews.text: This a fun pet costume and it looks awesome at night with the glow in the dark bones. An XL fit my 65 pound Rottie/Shep mix well. It smelt a little plastic-y when it first came out of the bag but that was solved with a little airing out. My only complaint (though mild) is the skeleton bones are not anatomically correct for a canine...its just an inverted human skeleton. It would have been a lot cooler if it was anatomically correct.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable (I'm guessing)
customer_reviews.text: Definitely had a smell when it arrived. I didn't have time to wash it (it arrived on Halloween morning), so I put it outside to air out for a while. That helped. It is soft, like a t-shirt. We skipped the hat part and just used the body. My dog wore it all night and even fell asleep in it. He was a hit with our party guests.
customer_reviews.author: sibyll

customer_reviews.title: Our doggie loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Little Tigger loves this costume, it was so hard for us to get it off of him. Plus, he looks so cute in it! AND IT'S GLOW IN THE DARK, so I wasn't getting surprise attacked by our border collie every time I opened the door in the mornings, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Head covering too large
customer_reviews.text: My dog is super cute in this costume, but the head covering is just too large. It needs to have a longer strip of velcro so that it adjusts more. The head part just ends up hanging off her upside down. The material feels like low cost T-shirt material. Wouldn't buy this again just for the body covering. I bought this for my West Highland White Terrier who is about 18 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: AmyDan

customer_reviews.title: This is adorable but SIZE RUNS EXTREMELY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable but SIZE RUNS EXTREMELY SMALL! I bought the medium for my 16 lb doggy & It is at least 2 sizes too small. I wish I had time to reorder but maybe next year..
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Order up
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. Large was a little small for my golden retriever (70lbs) but it'll work in a pinch since they don't offer exchanges.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: The large fit our 55 pound pit bull great! Her legs are REALLY long
customer_reviews.text: The large fit our 55 pound pit bull great! Her legs are REALLY long, so her back legs kept pulling it down her back, but it was so cute! It has holes for all 4 legs, but it didn't seem to bother her at all. The bones glow in the dark. The hat did not fit at all, but that was ok. Tempted to buy one for all the "kids" next year!
customer_reviews.author: TheSigningQuilter

customer_reviews.title: so cute its spooky
customer_reviews.text: This costume is so cute! it fits my corgi and scottie dog perfectly and is made from a soft comfortable material that doesn't impede their movement. The only thing that wasn't perfect was the hat part doesn't make much sense, but I already knew I only wanted the shirt part since my dogs are sensitive to things touching their ears. Overall a great costume, but I think they should sell it without the hat.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great costume
customer_reviews.text: This costume fit our 80 lb pitbull pretty well. It was a little larger than it needed to be but it stayed on. Most XL clothing we have purchased for him at pet stores has been to tight so he has room to grow into it this. The hat did not stay on. It fit on his head but he kept pulling it off. Got lots of compliments on our skeleton costumes.
customer_reviews.author: Caymijane

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: The large was a little snug on our dog, though we followed the size guidelines. We made adjustments and it worked out ok. If you have a lab, go with XL. We will in the future. Otherwise, costume was cute. Our dog was a hit in the neighborhood this year.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Plasencia

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume for Border Collie Mix
customer_reviews.text: My 45 lb Border Collie mix rocks this outfit in XL - I like the way if fits and she cannot "shake" it off. I have not tested the glow in the dark feature but she still looks good and I know it will show up under the black light. Soft fabric too, a little stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Magicwish33

customer_reviews.title: Loved this costume!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog loves to get dressed up and loved this outfit! It took her a couple of minutes to get used to the leg holes but after that she was strutting around. She wasn’t a fan of the hat/skull cap but overall she looked adorable and this costume was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Anderson-Magee

customer_reviews.title: The costume is adorable. Just wish the company had included a size ...
customer_reviews.text: The costume is adorable. Just wish the company had included a size chart. I got a medium for my mini poodle (10lbs) and it was huge on her.
customer_reviews.author: lolagirl

customer_reviews.title: dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this costume. It is very easy to put on, and it stays in place very well. The only part that didn't work well was the part for his head was too big. But that is only because is puppy head has not caught up to his body so it will fit next year. Great product, washable and easy for dogs to wear and function in. The glowing is just very cool to see, and perfectly creepy for halloween.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Halloween Dog Costume
customer_reviews.text: Good Halloween costume, though it runs a little small. The head piece is worthless. Bought an XL for a 85 lb gooldendoodle and it barely fits.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect costume
customer_reviews.text: Large fit our 60-lb American Bulldog just right. Awesome costume. We just nixed the hat. This was a perfect costume for our dog and we hope to use it yearly, although soon she may need an XL.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great costume, bad hat/hood
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to put on costume. I have a little black dog and this worked perfectly. The hat/skull part is a complete waste though. Very awkward to try and put on and as soon as I managed to get it on she pulled it right off and wanted nothing to do with it. If headpiece was better it'd be an easy 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Matthew VP

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is quite long enough but it works for her!
customer_reviews.author: a. garner

customer_reviews.title: Dog costume fits great
customer_reviews.text: Measure your dog before buying. This costume fits my beagle great- 16in from shoulder to tail. This costume is very cute, with hind leg holes to hold it in place. It was a bit confusing at first- which end is the head. Have a great looking dog this Halloween with this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween costume for large dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this costume for my dog. I was worried that it may not fit his since he is 90 lbs and very stocky. It fit perfectly and he was so cute on Halloween. I bought a second one for my other dog. It is make very well. I bought a similar costume the year before and the size ran small and it wasn't made well, so I was very pleased when I bought this one. I suggest this for anyone who is looking for a cute and durable costume for their dog.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume!
customer_reviews.text: I made sure to order a size up...x-large fits my 60 lb black lab perfectly! It’s super cute and I realized it makes her more visible at night, so when I walk her after dark, I put it on her. The outfit doesn’t seem to charge with just regular light, but my husband bought a special uv flashlight that makes it glow pretty brightly and the glow lasts maybe 10-15 min afterwards, which isn’t bad. As others have said, the hat doesn’t stay on that well, but it was good enough to get some pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything but the “hat” part of the costume. No way my dog was going to enjoy wearing that. Perfect otherwise. He’s a 70 lb lab and I got him the extra large. It fit great! He got compliments everywhere we went!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: True to sizing except for the headpiece
customer_reviews.text: The costumes fit perfect for both of my dogs (black lab and pocket pit). Went by measurements on the chart and they both looked comfortable wearing their costumes. The headpiece was too large for both of them though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hamann

customer_reviews.title: doggy bones
customer_reviews.text: Chico loves his clothes, he brings this outfit to me every morning
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nagypaul

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume, I will upload a photo. My dog definitely does not like the hat, so I will probably only make her wear it for pictures, but the rest of the costume is soft and stretchy and the pup promptly took a nap in it. Dog is 20" long, 22" around, about 40 lbs, got a size L.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Its well made but a little big for my 60lb ...
customer_reviews.text: Its well made but a little big for my 60lb boxer, it said on the directions to order one size up for stocky dogs and due to his deep chest I did he measured 21 neck to tail so I went up to xl its a little too long but very cute costume.
customer_reviews.author: luvmiboxers

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It is really easy to put on. I have a large Boxer and wasn't sure it would fit him, but it does! He looks so cute. It is a little snug, but after I slipped it on him, he went right back to playing and didn't even try to get it off or pay any attention to it whatsoever. Usually, anytime I put anything on him, he can't wait to get it off. I can't wait to put it on Halloween night! I'll have to find a contest to enter.
customer_reviews.author: TAG93

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and Accurately Sized
customer_reviews.text: This costume is adorable, and fits my pitbull (50 lbs) very well. I like that it goes over the front and back legs, which helps it stay in place. It is made of t-shirt material and will stretch out with use. I put it in the wash and had no problems. My dog is a freeze baby and likes wearing shirts and coats. He was not please by the hat, however. He looked super cute, and he glowed in the dark :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and my puppy still likes top seat it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: The product fit my dog great! It looks fantastic, and glows in the dark well. We're ready for Halloween super early; why can't it be fall already?
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not for frenchies
customer_reviews.text: It was thin and my dog hated the outfit. She was not comfortable in it .
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute and comfortable for my dog, she doesn’t like the hood portion but I like that it comes off. It is a bit big so keep that in mind when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: indeed
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I opened up this doggie costume and I must say it is adorable. This is saying a lot seeing as I am not fond of dogs. My girlfriend was so excited and loves it. It fits our little poodle perfectly except the head part is a little large. But other than that is a snug well fitting costume. It has sleeves for the front and back legs so it fits better than usual dog costumes that have the sleeves only in the front. It glows in the dark and it all around pretty sweet. I may just leave it on the dog all winter.
customer_reviews.author: C. wikoff

customer_reviews.title: is going to be the talk of the neighborhood this Halloween in this adorable costume!
customer_reviews.text: SO CUTE!!! Our puppy, Walter, is going to be the talk of the neighborhood this Halloween in this adorable costume!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P Cavanaugh Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great! Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great! Fit as expected. This is my French Bulldog, Doby. He likes it and I love it. He's probably just a little tall and thin as French Bulldogs go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bully for Halloween and it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Nicole Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wish large was actually for large dogs, maybe wouldnt fit so tight
customer_reviews.text: A little too small for my 50-55lb mixed breed with low chest. Smooth collie coonhound mix. Short haired. Armpit is too tight, rises up and makes it look uncomfortable. Material is very stretchy. Easy to put on a patient dog. Did not have a problem with her chewing on it.
customer_reviews.author: troncalli01

customer_reviews.title: it would be better if it was a little bit bigger but she ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 65 lb german shepherd and this JUST fits her. it would be better if it was a little bit bigger but she still wears it and looks adorable
customer_reviews.author: Moxie

customer_reviews.title: great costume
customer_reviews.text: This is the most adorable costume for any dog. My dog got more attention out trick or treating than the kids did. Adorable and fun! There was no loose parts or anything that bothered my dog. He acted like he didn't even know he was wearing it, although the head piece did not stay on very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but an XL will not fit a Great Dane!
customer_reviews.text: The product looked exactly as displayed in the picture. However, I wasn't able to put it on my dog. Even though she is a small Great Dane and the shirt fit around her, it was not long enough for her. Just a caution to any other extra large breed dog owners!
customer_reviews.author: J. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Love love love ❤️ My boy is around 70 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Love love love ❤️ My boy is around 70 pounds. I bought largest size and I think it’s slightly too big but we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great costume...the dog of course hated it but he looked cute and got a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cutest skeleton ever
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail!!!! Order a Large for my 50 lb mutt and it fits! A little snug but not a struggle to get on. The hood doesn’t fit AT ALL but the shirt is really all I cared about anyways. SO CUTE! Can’t wait for Halloween!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Garza

customer_reviews.title: Well made and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. Size small fit a 10 pound dachshund perfectly ... he wore it for hours without a fuss. (Not the little hat though - that he hated) Added bonus: dog was easy to see in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: JWest

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume. My Rugar receive lots of compliments. I would have given it 5 stars but even though my Chihuahua is small, and i ordered a small, he would have been more comfortable in a large. Unfortuntately, I think this will be the last year for use.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: pleased with product but
customer_reviews.text: The costume was as advertized and the dog seemed to enjoy the attention (and doggy treats!) from all her little friends."Kin is a skellydog this year!" With a lot of help fron Canada Post who delivered it after hours just before Hallowe'en, she looked a lot like the photo and appeared to find it comfortable and because it was a warmish night, cosy enough to go out and greet everybody. However, the costume weighed less than a baby onesie, would have fit in a large envekpe and I still think a charge of $[...] for shipping and handling was about three times the maximum it should have been!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably, except the hat which slides off too easy
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 98lb Rottweiler very well! The hat slides off easily, and it needs some work (like sewing elastic onto it to go under the chin) to prevent it from coming off. Otherwise, the outfit goes on well, fits well, and holds up well!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mackin

customer_reviews.title: They don't accept returns but they refunded my money which was really nice. I still put it on my dog even ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium and received a large. They don't accept returns but they refunded my money which was really nice. I still put it on my dog even tho it was too big it still looked cute, except the hat did not stay on her head. my dog is about 40 pounds and the medium would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennita

customer_reviews.title: Fun Costume
customer_reviews.text: Totally cute. I bought it for my 15lb dachshund. I got him a medium based on length, but it is a tad bit big on him, but I will make it work. He looks cute as can be.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 50lb pitty-mutt. The body fit great. The hood didn't fit at all. It was cute enough anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Gee

customer_reviews.title: This costume fit my Corgi well and he actually didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This costume fit my Corgi well and he actually didn't mind wearing it. Bathroom breaks were no problem and it actually glowed in the dark. I'm keeping it and will definitely throw it on Buju even if it's not Halloween just to have a laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: 4stars
customer_reviews.text: Loses 1 star because the head part doesn't stay up on the dogs head
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I got a small for my shih tzu yorkie mix . Check out the pictures! Love the 2 day shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Yelumcarolyn

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is a nice costume.
customer_reviews.text: Said it was large - didn't fit a german shepherd, or a labrador, or a collie. should have been labeled a medium. Other than that it is a nice costume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs act like they're wearing nothing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my large dogs, worried that the size would not be big enough. How wrong I was! I have a 95-lb Golden Retriever and a 102-lb Great Pyrenees, and the costumes fit both of them! The costumes are very stretchy so it seems like they have a lot of flexibility. My dogs ran around playing outside like usual even with the costumes on--they hardly seemed to notice they were wearing anything at all. Love these and can't wait to show them off on Halloween! Great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and funny. This product does tend to run slightly big. Also it doesn't glow in the dark quite as well as they would lead u to believe. The visual effect is still very funny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all year round!
customer_reviews.text: This runs a little small but is super cute!! The hood thing doesn't stay on but we didn't get it for Halloween so we don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the costume very well made and stayed in place the whole time my doggie was wearing it also the sizing is pretty accurate my dog is 20lb and size small fits her perfect my dog is a pug and jack Russell mix for reference!
customer_reviews.author: naty

customer_reviews.title: Like fitting a hotdog casing onto a kielbasa...
customer_reviews.text: I measured my boxer puppy and all of his measurements fit within the listing for the large. Someone at the factory must have been drunk when sewing the costume we received because the large was way too small for my pup (the hat was wayyyyy too large also). It's a cute costume but there is no way I can squeeze my dog back into it for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Vortex33

customer_reviews.title: Great costume but does seem to run big
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for Halloween. Our dogs absolutely loved them. They glow in the dark great. They do run a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... wearing clothes it fit her perfectly and she could easily move. Plus removing wasn't as difficult as expected
customer_reviews.text: Although she hates wearing clothes it fit her perfectly and she could easily move. Plus removing wasn't as difficult as expected
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 80lb Labrador, XL, and it fits great. He looks so cute in it and, of course, he hates it! Can't wait for Halloween!! It glows in the dark too!!! =) Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: VaBeach

customer_reviews.title: Love this costume
customer_reviews.text: So cute! The hat was too big and wouldn't stay on my dogs hear, but I think it's because her ears are so little. Even without the hat, it looked so cute on my pup.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Great Print
customer_reviews.text: I bought this costume because I wanted something for my dog that he wouldn't mind wearing. Most costumes for pets are a bit much in terms of things hanging off of them. This costume is great. It's super soft t-shirt material, but not cheap of thin. I bought the XL for my German Shepherd mix and he fits perfect. The only thing that doesn't fit well is the hat/hood. It is too big for my boy's head, but honestly I wasn't planning on making my dog wear something on his head. I would definitely recommend this costume. My dog, Axel, approves! :)
customer_reviews.author: amsdragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute Halloween outfit for our 49lbs Chinese sharpie ,everyone loves it
customer_reviews.author: David Shaffer

product_meta.title: Casual Canine Glow Bones Dog Skeleton Pet Costume
product_meta.description: Size:LargeThe spooky glowing skeleton on the glow bone costume stands out on a dark halloween night. It features a spooky glow in the dark skeleton design on the back, a fitted outfit, matching hat with ear holes and closure under the chin. Made of easy-care, machine-washable cotton with fitted trim and a stay-dry gentleman's cut. Comes in a polybag with a hanger and hangtag. Available in large size and measures 20-inch length. Large size fit for brittany spaniel, bulldog, collie, schnauzer, springer spaniel breeds.
feature_bullets: This fun two-piece dog costume for Halloween features a fitted outfit and matching hat
Made of easy-care, machine-washable cotton with fitted trim and a stay-dry gentleman's cut
Shipped in a polybag with a hanger and hangtag
